full_summary:
================================
**Tender Announcement: Living Units Door, Power and Lighting Control System Upgrade - CSC Springhill NS**

**Reference Number**: PW-_PWJ-018-6266
**Date Published**: 2022-09-30
**Tender Closing Date**: 2022-10-18T13:00:00
**Contracting Authority**: Public Works and Government Services Canada

**Project Overview**
The Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) has a requirement for the Living Units Door, Power and Lighting Control System upgrade for Buildings 5, 50, 51, and 58 of the Correctional Services Canada (CSC), located at the Springhill Institution, Springhill, Nova Scotia. The scope of work includes the replacement of the existing door and control management system, upgrade of the communication system, and commissioning of the new system.

**Submission Requirements**

Suppliers interested in submitting a bid must meet the qualifications outlined in the Letter of Interest. The bid must be submitted electronically using the Canada Post Corporation's (CPC) Connect Service application.

**Notice of Two-Phase Selection Process**
This tender is part of a two-phase selection process. Phase One will evaluate the qualifications of interested suppliers, and Phase Two will invite qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings.

**Submission Documents**
Please visit the Canada Buys website for further information and to access the submission documents.

**Evaluation Criteria**
The evaluation will be based on the lowest price submitted.

**Language of Submission**
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Inquiries**
All inquiries of a technical nature and all questions of a contractual nature should be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority: Timothee Beausoleil, telephone (902) 388-8377, email timothee.beausoleil2@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca. Inquiries should be made in writing and should be received no less than five (5) calendar days prior to the closing date.

**Trade Agreements**
This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Estimated Cost**
The estimated cost for this project is between $1,000,001 to $5,000,000 (HST included).

**Timeline**
The expected contract start date is January 2025.

**Additional Information**
Please visit the Canada Buys website for further information and to access the submission documents.
